documentation.content: Specifies the condition that determines whether the provided runnable should be executed. If this condition evaluates to true, the execution proceeds with the runnable defined in the second parameter.

description.content: Runnable to execute when the condition is true.

documentation.content: Defines the runnable that runs if the condition evaluates to true.

description.content: Executes the specified runnable if the condition evaluates to true.

documentation.content: The 'If' runnable evaluates a boolean condition and, if it is true, executes the provided runnable. If the condition is false, execution continues without running the runnable. This behavior corresponds to a standard 'if' statement in programming languages.
